post.body: I'm doing great. How have you been sweetie?
And what's that's supposed to mean? 
She says nothing less than 94 cents Canadian and even then it's only a deal if it's a soft peppermint.
So you're her co-conspirator!!! Tell me what you demand. Is it control of my army of snow ninjas? I say NEVER!!!
I totally understand. I think chocolate is worth more than me on the Dow Jones these days. Stupid recession...
It's going good sweetheart. How have you been?
You know I miss you guys too. How's my lil buddy doin?
I'm gussing we've gotten about 5 inches so far, with another 5-7 on the way.
I think it's the early symptoms of cabin fever. I'm stuck at mom's until FEMA shows up. lol 
Hello there. *hugs back*
Ain't it past your bedtime miss? 
Dunno, I'm goin between Heroes and the game.
Which one?
What part of Ohio?
You heard about Romo right?
You ok?
No of course not. Santa was. He left the wrong package here, it ended up in police hands and charges are pending.
The leg is getting there slowly, but surely. Santa avoids my house, something to to with smggling Bolivian midgets and emus.
Mom refuses to take me home. I'm pretty sure this is a hostage situation. Has anyboy gotten any ransom demands yet?
Buckle up kiddies. Mother nature is still having a temper tantrum. I can finally build my army of snow ninjas. You will all tremble in fear!
Why am I still awake?!?!?!?
Oh by the way, what time is this week's T.O. meltdown starting? That's must see tv right there.
Turn out the lights. Texas stadium is officially closed. Nicely done Ravens....
